title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the answer

1 point is earned for the reason

On the interval 1.7 < x < 1.9, f' is decreasing and thus f is concave down on this interval.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for the answer

1 point is earned for the reason

On the interval 1.7 < x < 1.9, f' is decreasing and thus f is concave down on this interval.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned if identified π MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaOaaaeaacqaHapaCaSqabaaaaa@37CC@ and 3 as candidates or indicates that the graph of f increases, decreases, then increases

f(0) = 5

f( π )=f(0)+ ∫ 0 π f ′ (x)dx=5.67911 f( 3 )=f(0)+ ∫ 0 3 f ′ (x)dx=5.57893 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@6684@
